text: this is al Kaufman known to listeners of
WFAN sports radio as short al from
Brooklyn the old-timer who called into
the station daily to speak on the air
about his beloved New York Mets and his
memories of the Brooklyn Dodgers short
al mysteriously stopped calling in last
year turns out he was hospitalized and
had to move in with his daughter in
Bensonhurst Brooklyn and can no longer
call the station I managed to contact
him recently and I met him in this
Brooklyn diner a lot of people didn't
know what happened to me someone thought
I passed away some of them didn't know
what happened and some may to tell them
that I'm here I'm doing very well you
were a regular call everyone do you work
seven days a week how come you don't
call it anymore I can't call anymore
because I'm living with my daughter now
and she sleeps gets up early in the
morning at 6 o'clock and she hears and I
don't want to wake up I'm still a big
metro to and nice to look but I'm like
well them I watched him on television
